org.opendaylight.controller.xml.codec

Class XmlStreamUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opendaylight.controller.xml.codec.XmlStreamUtils

  • @Beta
public class XmlStreamUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for bridging JAXP Stream and YANG Data APIs. Note that the definition of this class by no means final and subject to change as more functionality is centralized here.

    • Method Summary

      Create a new instance encapsulating a particular codec provider.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static XmlStreamUtils create(org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.data.impl.codec.xml.XmlCodecProvider codecProvider)
        Create a new instance encapsulating a particular codec provider.
        Parameters:
        codecProvider - XML codec provider
        Returns:
        A new instance

      • isEmptyElement

        public static boolean isEmptyElement(org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.data.api.Node<?> data)
        Check if a particular data element can be emitted as an empty element, bypassing value encoding. This functionality is optional, as valid XML stream is produced even if start/end element is produced unconditionally.
        Parameters:
        data - Data node
        Returns:
        True if the data node will result in empty element body.

      • write

        public static void write(@Nonnull
         javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamWriter writer,
         @Nonnull
         org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.data.api.YangInstanceIdentifier id)
                  throws javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamException
        Write an InstanceIdentifier into the output stream. Calling corresponding XMLStreamWriter.writeStartElement(String) and XMLStreamWriter.writeEndElement() is the responsibility of the caller.
        Parameters:
        writer - XML Stream writer
        id - InstanceIdentifier
        Throws:
        javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamException

      • writeDocument

        public void writeDocument(@Nonnull
                 javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamWriter writer,
                 @Nonnull
                 org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.data.api.CompositeNode data,
                 @Nullable
                 org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.model.api.SchemaNode schema)
                   throws javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamException
        Write a full XML document corresponding to a CompositeNode into an XML stream writer.
        Parameters:
        writer - XML Stream writer
        data - data node
        schema - corresponding schema node, may be null
        Throws:
        javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamException - if an encoding problem occurs

      • writeElement

        public void writeElement(javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamWriter writer,
                @Nonnull
                org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.data.api.Node<?> data,
                org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.model.api.SchemaNode schema)
                  throws javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamException
        Write an element into a XML stream writer. This includes the element start/end tags and the value of the element.
        Parameters:
        writer - XML Stream writer
        data - data node
        schema - Schema node
        Throws:
        javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamException - if an encoding problem occurs

      • writeValue

        public void writeValue(@Nonnull
              javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamWriter writer,
              @Nonnull
              org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.model.api.TypeDefinition<?> type,
              java.lang.Object value)
                throws javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamException
        Write a value into a XML stream writer. This method assumes the start and end of element is emitted by the caller.
        Parameters:
        writer - XML Stream writer
        type - type definitions
        value - object value
        Throws:
        javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamException - if an encoding problem occurs
